decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly assembling a board presence with aggressive creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist, supported by powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration while still presenting a lethal threat with cards like Heart of Kiran. By combining a mix of creatures, vehicles, and removal, this deck puts pressure on the opponent from multiple angles, forcing them to react and giving you the advantage in the match.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence with aggressive creatures like Longtusk Cub and Glorybringer, while also generating mana through cards like Servant of the Conduit and Attune with Aether. Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides additional card advantage and removal, while Bristling Hydra offers protection and resilience. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game, utilizing a mix of creatures, removal spells, and mana acceleration to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Scrapheap Scrounger, along with powerful removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push, to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The deck also includes planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar for additional threats and versatility. With a mix of aggressive creatures, removal, and planeswalkers, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents with strong, efficient plays and a fast clock. The manabase includes a mix of lands to ensure consistent access to the deck's diverse array of spells.

The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient low-cost creatures in order to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. By utilizing cards like Diregraf Colossus, Cryptbreaker, and Metallic Mimic, the deck aims to flood the battlefield with zombies while using cards like Liliana's Mastery and Lord of the Accursed to buff and pump up the creatures. Removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push help to clear the way for attacks, while cards like Relentless Dead and Dread Wanderer provide recursion and added resilience to the deck.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures like Scrapheap Scrounger, Toolcraft Exemplar, and Veteran Motorist, supported by removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration. The deck also includes powerful vehicles like Heart of Kiran and Gideon, Ally of Zendikar to control the battlefield. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Gideon and creatures like Glorybringer and Archangel Avacyn adds versatility and different angles of attack, making it difficult for the opponent to defend against the constant pressure of the Mardu Aggro archetype.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on utilizing +1/+1 counters and energy generation to overwhelm opponents with efficient creatures. By combining cards like Winding Constrictor, Longtusk Cub, and Rishkar, Peema Renegade, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and generate advantages through synergy. With a mix of both aggressive creatures and removal spells like Fatal Push and Grasp of Darkness, the deck can maintain pressure while disrupting opposing strategies. Additionally, cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar provide additional utility and ways to pump up the team.

The deck focuses on flooding the board with aggressive creatures like Lord of the Accursed, Dread Wanderer, and Cryptbreaker, supported by Diregraf Colossus for additional zombie tokens. Removal spells like Grasp of Darkness and Fatal Push help clear the way for attacks, while Liliana's Mastery provides a powerful buff to all zombies. The deck also utilizes Dark Salvation as both removal and token generation. Scrapheap Scrounger and Relentless Dead provide resilience and return from the graveyard to maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly building up energy counters and powering up creatures like Voltaic Brawler, Electrostatic Pummeler, and Longtusk Cub to deliver quick, powerful attacks. With cards like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit providing additional energy and mana ramp, along with pump spells like Invigorated Rampage and Larger Than Life, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big, early-game threats. Blossoming Defense and Harnessed Lightning provide protection and removal options to keep the pressure on and secure victories before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to use efficient creatures and removal spells to apply early pressure on the opponent while ramping into powerful threats like Glorybringer and Chandra, Torch of Defiance. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Harnessed Lightning and Magma Spray, while also generating energy with cards like Attune with Aether and Servant of the Conduit to power up cards like Bristling Hydra and Whirler Virtuoso. By maintaining a strong board presence and applying pressure consistently, the deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on maximizing +1/+1 counters and energy generation to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Winding Constrictor and Rishkar, Peema Renegade, the deck can quickly beef up its creatures and outpace the opponent. Utilizing cards like Walking Ballista and Fatal Push for removal and disruption, the deck aims to maintain control while pushing for aggressive plays. The deck also includes cards like Nissa, Voice of Zendikar for additional token generation and combat trick potential, providing multiple avenues for victory.

The deck aims to utilize aggressive creatures and powerful planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game. It includes various powerful threats such as Heart of Kiran, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Toolcraft Exemplar to quickly build a strong board presence. The combination of removal spells like Fatal Push and Unlicensed Disintegration helps to control the board and clear a path for the aggressive creatures to attack. Additionally, the inclusion of versatile cards like Walking Ballista and Cut/Ribbons provides flexibility in dealing with a variety of situations.

The main focus of this UW Control deck is to heavily control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw in order to ultimately outvalue the opponent. It aims to establish board control with cards like Stasis Snare and Immolating Glare, while also having access to powerful finishers such as Torrential Gearhulk and Kefnet the Mindful. By denying the opponent's threats and generating card advantage, this deck aims to grind out a win by outlasting the opponent and overwhelming them with powerful spells and creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to establish a dominance on the battlefield through a fast and aggressive approach. By utilizing efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist, along with powerful vehicles such as Heart of Kiran and Cultivator's Caravan, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Unlicensed Disintegration and Fatal Push provide removal options to clear the path for attacks. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Gideon, Ally of Zendikar and defensive creatures like Archangel Avacyn adds versatility and resilience to the aggressive game plan. This deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game swiftly.

This Mardu Aggro deck aims to establish an aggressive board presence early on with efficient creatures like Toolcraft Exemplar and Veteran Motorist supported by vehicles such as Heart of Kiran. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Spell Queller and removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration to control the board and keep the pressure on the opponent. With a mix of creatures, removal, and disruption, this deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently to secure a victory before they have a chance to stabilize.

This Temur Aggro deck focuses on generating energy to power up creatures and spells quickly, allowing for aggressive plays and efficient removal. By utilizing cards like Longtusk Cub and Bristling Hydra to benefit from energy counters, along with powerful creatures like Glorybringer, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent quickly and overwhelm them with powerful threats. With a mix of early game aggression and mid-game value, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents in a Standard 1 vs 1 format.
